00020 namespace VecMath {
00026     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Matrix {
00027         public:
00028             Matrix<D, N> ();
00029             Matrix<D, N> (N, N, N, N, N, N);
00030             Matrix<D, N> (unsigned, unsigned, N);
00031             virtual ~Matrix<D, N> () { }
00032 
00037             N &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) { return M[i][j]; }
00038 
00039             Matrix<D, N> operator *=(const Matrix<D, N> &);
00040             Matrix<D, N> operator *(const Matrix<D, N> &) const;
00041             Vector<D, N> operator *(const Vector<D, N> &);
00042 
00043             Matrix<D, N> operator - ();
00044 
00045             std::string Print ();
00046 
00047         private:
00049             N M[D][D];
00050     };
00051 
00052 
00054     template<unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>::Matrix () {
00055         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                  //  i: row
00056             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00057                 M[i][j] = 0;
00058             M[i][i] = 1;
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00069     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00070             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (N Rxy, N Rxz, N Rxw, N Ryz, N Ryw, N Rzw) {
00071         throw NotYetImplementedException(
00072             "Matrix<"+Global::itoa(D)+">::Matrix<"+Global::itoa(D)+
00073                 "> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw)");
00074         abort();
00075     }
00076 
00081     template<unsigned D, typename N>
00082             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, N Theta) {
00083         N c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00084         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                  //  i: row
00085             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00086                 M[i][j] = 0;
00087             M[i][i] = 1;
00088         }
00089         M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00090         M[ii][jj] = -s;
00091         M[jj][ii] = s;
00092     }
00093 
00097     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00098             Matrix<D, N>::operator *=(const Matrix<D, N> &B) {
00099         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)            //  i: row
00100             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {      //  j: col
00101                 N s = 0;
00102                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00103                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00104                 M[i][j] = s;
00105             }
00106         return *this;
00107     }
00108 
00112     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00113             Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &B) const {
00114         Matrix<D, N> C;
00115         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                    //  i: row
00116             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {              //  j: col
00117                 N s = 0;
00118                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00119                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00120                 C.M[i][j] = s;
00121             }
00122         return C;
00123     }
00124 
00128     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00129             Vector<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Vector<D, N> &V) {
00130         Vector<D, N> W;
00131         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {              //  i: row
00132             N s = 0;
00133             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)            //  j: col
00134                 s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00135             W[i] = s;
00136         }
00137         return W;
00138     }
00139 
00142     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00143             Matrix<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator - () {
00144         Matrix<D, N> B (*this);
00145         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                    //  i: row
00146             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {              //  j: col
00147                 B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00148             }
00149         return B;
00150     }
00151 
00152 
00154     template <unsigned D, typename N> std::string Matrix<D, N>::Print () {
00155         std::ostringstream o;
00156         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00157             o << "|";
00158             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00159                 o << std::setw (10) << std::setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00160             o << "|\n";
00161         }
00162         o << std::ends;
00163         return o.str ();
00164     }
